page.title: 07LIFE STYLES
page.content:
{Old people}are usually over sixty and retired. They have many hobbies such as allotment gardening, cooking and baking. They enjoy soap operas on television and the news. They help with village functions such as the Gala, Christmas and Harvest Festivals.
Some are parish councillors. They have an{over sixties club}with with twenty-two members who meet weekly on Tuesday at two o'clock. The club was moved after thirty-six years from Quaker Lane to the Community Centre in 1984 and usual activities include cards, bingo and going to places of interest. Refreshments are available. The oldest member is in her eighties.
